SEARCH
Package orderFood

Class OrderTracking

java.lang.Object
orderFood.OrderTracking
public class OrderTracking extends Object
The OrderTracking class represents the tracking system for orders in a food order service. It allows tracking orders, updating order status, and displaying order details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderTracking()
    Constructs a new OrderTracking object with an empty map of order statuses.

  • Method Details

    • trackOrder

      public void trackOrder(int customerId, int orderId)
      Tracks the order with the specified customer ID and order ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      orderId - The ID of the order to track.

    • updateOrderStatus

      public void updateOrderStatus(int adminId, int orderId, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of the order with the specified admin ID, order ID, and new status.
      Parameters:
      adminId - The ID of the admin updating the order status.
      orderId - The ID of the order to update.
      newStatus - The new status for the order.
